name: Swipe Jump
description:
A prototype for a casual mobile game made in the month of January. Swipe and Jump your way through the first stage. There are 5 levels followed by a boss, along with a shop full of animals to unlock.

INSTRUCTIONS:
- Drag and Release to launch your character, Jumping has a 1 second cooldown.
- Hit Enemies to instantly reset your jump and progress your star bar toward the next level. 
- Avoid bombs!
